description: For those of us taking pictures with cameras not equipped with GPS capability, KGeoTag fills a huge gap in preserving our memories. It took me a bit to figure out how to assign a map location to an image, and I may yet not be doing it well, but it works.
Map window is black! probably is there a prerequsite to have som sort of map program installed?
Downloaded from the store from default Ubuntu (live USB) and it won't even start. Really sad because the app itself is really good.
La carte reste noire, donc inutilisable
